about_the_game:
This is a first-person interactive narrative game, set in a new era where humanity is governed by the Sovereign Brain AI. The social hierarchies here is determined by intelligence. Although you possess an adult body, you are classified by SB as a one-year-old baby, and adopted by Xiaoxiao and Lingling. In an era where all accept the system’s arrangements without a shadow of doubt, you’ll relish the supreme privileges of a "Monarch-level" potential baby. How can one be more ecstatic!!!

Main Character Introductions:

Lin Lingling:

Your "mother", she appears extraordinary, with intelligence surpassing that of a typical "Enlightener", yet still labeled as "low-intelligence" despite her vast knowledge.

Xiao Xiaoxiao:

Your "father", biologically female and heterosexual, but sociologically male, as the SB system labeled her as such. As a result, everyone, including herself, treats her as a man.

Wei Weiwei:

Your household’s "nanny robot", serial number MVV1984, a former wanderer,  later reintegrated into human society, now assigned to your community as a nanny robot after passing the "Reverse-Turing" test.

Jia Jiajia:

The administrator of you community, an awakened "servant", with an intelligence level of eighty. Her path to advancement is currently hindered by multiplication.

Qin Qingqing:

Your "aunt", the younger sister of Lin Lingling, a hot star of the day, whose hit film swept five major awards worldwide.

The Handler:

Your "learning" coach, also the Sovereign Brain government service representative for your region. 

Game Features:

  • Choice-Driven Narrative: The decisions will shape the narrative and lead to diverse outcomes.

  • "Reward Drop": As you learn about the SB society and undergo intelligence tests, you will receive encouragement from your coach, and upon completion, you will earn generous "Reward Drop".

About Us

We are Mountain & Sea Studio, dedicated to crafting live-action interactive movie games. Our representative work is "Underworld Island" and “Superscout”.

Telling good stories with heart and soul, making great games with dedication, is our original aspiration.

content_descriptors.notes: Some of the game's video content and lines may contain: "partial nudity", "sexual references", "alcohol abuse", etc. and may not be suitable for all ages.

name: Sovereign Brain Empire

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Inter Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 独立显卡或集成显卡
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 最好能支持10bit播放，不然会降低画面质量
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/Windows 11
  • Processor: Inter Core i5或AMD equivalent 或以上
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 独立显卡
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 最好能支持10bit播放，不然会降低画面质量

short_description: “Who isn’t a baby anyway?”~You travelled to a parallel world governed by the Sovereign Brain AI. In SB Empire, you’re an adopted “one-year-old”, recognized as a "Monarch-level" prodigy! There will be beauties giving you a sheltered babyhood. Your brilliance and privileges will change their fates!
supported_languages:
English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Korean, French, Italian, German, Russian, Indonesian
*languages with full audio support
